architectural_notes: "Access Admin Portal" button must navigate/redirect to https://nehitha-thandal-managementtool-0c2.caffeine.xyz/ when clicked.
known_issues: Clicking "Access Admin Portal" does not correctly navigate to https://nehitha-thandal-managementtool-0c2.caffeine.xyz/ (navigation/redirect bug).

existing_features.title: Update the Landing page so that clicking the "Access Admin Portal" button navigates the user to the external URL https://nehitha-thandal-managementtool-0c2.caffeine.xyz/ (full page navigation in the same tab), instead of routing to the internal "/admin/signin" route.

projectName: Fix 'Access Admin Portal' button to navigate to external Admin Portal URL
